programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: seorang gadis jatuh hati kepada seorang pemuda tampan yang merupakan ketua pegawai eksekutif di syarikat miliknya . Gadis itu mula tertarik kepada pemuda ini setelah beliau bantu mengejar peragut beg tangannya . Pemuda itu turut jatuh hati terhadap si gadis yang pernah membulinya semasa di sekolah dahulu

programme.title: Maria Mariana 1
programme.desc: Dua beradik perempuan dibesarkan dalam sebuah keluarga, namun adik memiliki sikap negatif dan berprasangka tidak baik terhadap kasih sayang yang diberikan oleh kedua ibu bapanya dan merasakan ibu bapanya memberi kasih sayag yang lebih kepada kakaknya.

programme.title: The Hotel
programme.desc: balas dendam seorang lelaki tua yang telah menjadi hantu selepas dia membunuh diri di rumah mewahnya. Dia ingin membunuh bekas isteri dia dan suaminya serta dua orang anaknya kerana bekas isterinya telah menipu dia dengan melarikan diri dengan kekasihnya pada hari perkahwinan dia. Bekas isteri dan suaminya memutuskan untuk berpindah dan menjadikan rumah itu sebagai sebuah hotel untuk menjana wang.

programme.title: Tmo Cuti Cuti Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Cuti Cuti Cinta

programme.title: Cendera Kasih
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang ditinggalkan isterinya akibat perbuatan ibunya sendiri berjumpa semula dengan isterinya apabila ditugaskan menguruskan projek di kedah . Lelaki yang masih sayangkan isteri dan anaknya itu merayu supaya isterinya pulang ke pangkuannya

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Gang Preed
programme.desc: Kisah pelajar sekolah menengah yang sangat meminati filem seram. Mo adalah pengarah dan juga mengetuai kumpulan kecil ini. Suatu hari Mo terserempak dengan Prang, seorang gadis misteri yang dipindahkan dari sekolah lain. Mo memberitahu rakan-rakannya bahawa dia benar-benar mahukan dia sebagai peneraju filem baharunya. Masalah antara pembuat filem yang buruk dan gadis pelik bermula, bersama dengan persahabatan dan cinta yang mula mekar tanpa mereka sedari.

programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Abang Sate Cintanya Mulai Dari Nol Ya, Senin Harga Naik!
programme.desc: Ternyata Raisa dan Rahman lari ke Jakarta. Akhirnya, sesuatu berlaku, dan mereka akhirnya berkahwin supaya mereka boleh pergi ke Jakarta bersama-sama. Perkahwinan palsu bertukar menjadi cinta sejati.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep66
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep29
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep7
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep9
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep25
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Ditikung Sahabat Sendiri
programme.desc: Jeni dan Kevin merupakan sepasang kekasih yang sering mengumbar kemesraan di kanal youtube mereka. Karena terlibat kontroversi, Kevin harus mendekam di penjara.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.desc: Jeni dan Kevin merupakan sepasang kekasih yang sering mengumbar kemesraan di kanal youtube mereka. Karena terlibat kontroversi, Kevin harus mendekam di penjara.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep25
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep30
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep8
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep10
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.desc: Starring Luo Jin, Yuan Shanshan, Shen Mengchen, Zhang Zijian, etc. A story about targeted poverty alleviation in the village follows a second-generation poverty alleviation officer and an urban reporter from the big city who overcomes numerous difficulties in their efforts to lead the villagers out of poverty.

programme.title: Masked Dancing King 2022 Ep10
programme.desc: New interpretation and concept to show the national dancing culture! Masked Dancing King 2022 gathered those fantastic dance-lovers and celebrities in this show. First ever title “Masked Dancing King Troupe” will be ultimately launched after the marvelous team competitions and elimination matches.

programme.title: New Chinese Dating Event Season 6 Ep12
programme.desc: Celebrities are invited to join and reveal their experience and love stories in Season Six to help the guests to find true love. The show aims to interpret youngsters’ views on marriage and love through discussion among different generation.

programme.title: Fighting Man Ep1
programme.desc: Jing Bo Ran and Wang Kai lead the team members, Jam Hsiao, Jackson Wang, Yang Shuo and Bai Jing Ting, to work together to complete various difficult task challenges, such as the high-altitude adventures, room escape games, and the cross country activities.

programme.title: Relation Ship Ep9
programme.desc: A romance variety show which six strangers travel together on a cruise exchanging signals of love and growing emotions . Stars such as Meng Fei, Huang Wei, Zhang Chun-yi, Guo Jing-fei, Zhu Zheng-ting, and Cheng Xiao will form an observation group to discuss and analyze the relationship of the potential lovers.

programme.title: Perfect Match (2018) Ep41
programme.desc: The brand new version of "Perfect Match", 24 female guests will be divided into think about zone and observation zone. The male guests will not show their appearance at that moment. They will have conversation with the female guests through the "second scene". All guests by two-way choice get to decide if they are the right persons to couple up.

programme.title: Athletes and Stars Season 2 Ep6
programme.desc: The reality show gathered over 20 top sports champions and artists including Chun Wu, Fan Zhiyi, Meng Hetang and Han Tianyu. They divided into two teams to have 12 different sports competitions. They strive for the champion and hopefully compete for the glory of “Champion Team”.

programme.title: A Land So Rich In Beauty Ep29
programme.desc: Starring Luo Jin, Yuan Shanshan, Shen Mengchen, Zhang Zijian, etc. A story about targeted poverty alleviation in the village follows a second-generation poverty alleviation officer and an urban reporter from the big city who overcomes numerous difficulties in their efforts to lead the villagers out of poverty.

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep352
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Government’s policy of “one country, two systems” in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmen’s understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3352
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45234524
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep863864
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1770
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1972
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep374
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3523
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45244525
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1973
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Wednesday (M) Ep374
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kong’s neon nights. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. Starting afresh, he begins to assemble a group of children to compete in the Latin dance competition. But can Yu, still facing his own insecurities, bring out the best in these children and let them shine on stage?

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: A young constable unwittingly gets involved with a secret organization named Wu Yin Men, where all members have supernatural abilities and have protected mankind for centuries. When he learns that mysterious demons with power to destroy the world are increasing, the adventure to hunt them down with Wu Yin Men begins!

programme.title: Let me Eat Your Pancreas
programme.desc: A student called “I” finds the diary of his classmate, Sakura Yamauchi, and discovers that she has a pancreatic disease. The two begin to spend more time together, but Sakura eventually pass away from her illness. But Sakura had a hidden message she wanted to convey, will “I” uncover it 12 years after her death?

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Seven friends get together and decide to play a game where they must share all the messages and calls and app notifications on each other’s cell phones. Hilarity and drama follows as everyone's secrets are unveiled throughout the evening, and the seven friends find themselves more like strangers to each other than ever before!

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kong’s greatest filmmakers. It traces Hui’s life story and her 40-year career’s ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: The Sinking City Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people living in ‘space capsules’ – large seminar rooms subdivided into small living quarters - struggle to fight for their ideal way of life in the prosperous yet divided city of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asia’s top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents’ money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a “Mr McDreamy Training Academy” using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into “Mr McDreamies” with hilarious results.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: To Kill A Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper’s daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the ‘Flying Guillotine Squad’, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman supreme Cheng Pei-pei (Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon) teams up with director/writer/actor Lo Wei (director of Bruce Lee and Jackie Chan’s first major movies) for an evocative and terrific “Martial arts world” adventure consisting of a missing blade and a deadly sect of men-hating swordswomen.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hon’s pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named “Shadow Whip”, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to “Shadow Whip”?

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in the northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Because of his ignorance and silly behaviour, he was seen as a joke to the people. The warlord was finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason.

programme.title: Return Of The One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: One-armed Swordsman Fang Kang wants to lead a quiet life with his wife, but when she is abducted by the Eight Demon Swordsmen clan, he is forced to take them on in order to save her.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed “The Invincible Fist” is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Martial arts melodrama about a lady-warrior who raises the son of the swordsman who scorned her. Unknowingly, she also has a twin sister that has been raised by her enemy and trained to eventually kill her…

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: Apartment For Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies’ youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their daughter Ling Yun, the eldest son Ling Hsiao, and a young artist Hsu, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The 36Th Chamber Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li’s new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: Accepted to the Golden Sword School after his father sacrificed his life to save his master, Fang Kang is resented by his fellow pupils and decides to leave. His master's daughter challenges him to a fight and cuts off his arm. Fang masters the art of sword fighting with one arm and finds himself returning to the School to save his master again.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: Biscoth
programme.desc: After the death of his father, Raja begins to work in his father's company. He, however, finds his life changed when he befriends Janaki who narrates stories that come true for him.

programme.title: Aan Devathai
programme.desc: Difficulties arise when Elango and Jessie, a married couple and parents of twins, decide to lead separate lives owing to an ugly fight.

programme.title: Kanaa
programme.desc: A woman who hails from a middle-class family background aims to excel in the competitive world of cricket with the help of her supportive father.

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.

programme.title: Veerame Vaagai Soodum
programme.desc: A normal man from a middle-class family questioning the authorities for abusing their powers.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Bangalore Naatkal
programme.desc: Three cousins, Arjun, Divya and Kannan, relocate to Bangalore for various reasons. However, they face many challenges which change their lives forever.

programme.title: Irumbu Thirai
programme.desc: A military officer borrows money from a bank using fake papers for his sister's marriage. However, when the money goes missing from his account, he begins an investigation that leads him to a hacker.

programme.title: Maragadha Naanayam
programme.desc: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

programme.title: Zombie Reddy
programme.desc: Mario, a game developer, and his friends, get caught up in the rivalry between two families and a mysterious zombie attack in Rayalaseema where they go to attend a friend's wedding.

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Magalir Mattum
programme.desc: Prabhavati, an independent documentary filmmaker, with the help of her friends takes her mother-in-law, Gomatha, on a surprise trip to reunite her with her school friends.

programme.title: Rajini Murugan
programme.desc: An unemployed Rajini Murugan falls in love with Karthika, but her father opposes their union due to an old misunderstanding. Things get better after Rajini inherits his grandfather's property.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Kaadan
programme.desc: Kaadan is a true-blue animal film signifying a deep and strong bond between humans and animals.

programme.title: Bow Bow
programme.desc: Sanju, a little boy, adopts different methods to train his lazy dog. His world, however, comes crashing down when he loses the dog.

programme.title: Lakshmi
programme.desc: Lakshmi dreams of winning a national level dance competition but is scared to participate as her mother despises dancing. However, things take a turn when she meets Krishna, a cafe owner.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Goli Soda
programme.desc: Four adolescent boys fall prey of a baddie and things turn ugly.

programme.title: Kodi Veeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.desc: Movie starring Karikalan, Priti Arora and Pandiyarajan and is directed by Karikalan.

programme.title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
programme.desc: Munna Bhai, a gangster, meets Komal and instantly falls in love with her. In a bid to marry her, he must fight with Komal's elder brother, Dr Rastogi, and her lover, Raja.

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Kapoor & Sons
programme.desc: Brothers Arjun and Rahul return home to visit their ailing grandfather. Amidst numerous ongoing family problems, emotions get intensified when a girl causes a rift between the two.

programme.title: Beta
programme.desc: Raju, a young man, is devoted to his stepmother as he only wishes to be showered with motherly love. However, his stepmother exploits his love to extort his wealth.

programme.title: Chalte Chalte
programme.desc: Raj, the owner of a truck company, pursues Priya, a fashion designer, and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a separation that threatens to destroy their relationship.

programme.title: Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya
programme.desc: Samir lies to his girlfriend, Sonia, that he is in an unhappy marriage. However, when he actually falls in love with her, she requests him to meet his estranged wife, putting him in a predicament.

programme.title: Yevadu
programme.desc: Satya gets a different face after he is almost killed, but a new face multiplies his problems. His ordeal begins when he leaves the hospital and has to deal with his lover's murderer.

programme.title: The Fighter Mard No. 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, Prabhakaran, puts a notorious gangster, Easwaramoorthy, behind bars. When Easwaramoorthy learns of his identity, he decides to take revenge by targeting Prabhakaran's sister.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Naqaab - Disguised Intentions
programme.desc: Sophia is engaged to millionaire Karan who is completely in love with her. However, when she meets her true love, Vicky, and starts seeing him secretly, her relationship with Karan suffers.

programme.title: Parampara
programme.desc: Friends Pratap and Ranvir eventually discover that there is an old score to be settled between their families. Unfortunately, this can only be settled when they face each other in a deadly duel.

programme.title: Meri Jung: One Man Army
programme.desc: When Mass decides to marry Anjali, a gangster's daughter, her father tries to kill Mass, but his best friend, Adi gets killed. Mass sets out to avenge Adi's death.

programme.title: Meri Jung: One Man Army
programme.desc: When Mass decides to marry Anjali, a gangster's daughter, her father tries to kill Mass, but his best friend, Adi gets killed. Mass sets out to avenge Adi's death.

programme.title: Zila Ghaziabad
programme.desc: A full-blown gang war comes to life in the district of Ghaziabad with the rise of the rivalry between gangsters Fauji and Satbir. A corrupt policeman, Pritam Singh, is sent down to set things right.

programme.title: Chaahat
programme.desc: When Roop comes to the city for his father's medical treatment, he falls for Pooja and proposes to her. However, when a spoilt Reshma falls for him, she turns crazy and tries to own him.

programme.title: Billu
programme.desc: The people in a village discover that Billu, a poor barber, is a childhood friend of the superstar Sahir Khan, who has arrived for a film shoot. They shower him with favours to introduce them to him.

programme.title: Student of the Year 2
programme.desc: Rohan follows his lover, Mridula, to St Teresa's college hoping to reunite with her. There, he befriends Manav, the most popular student, but is constantly at loggerheads with his sister, Shreya.

programme.title: Jeet Hamari
programme.desc: Balu has a fight with the local thug, Kasi, when he visits his friend, Karthik. A furious Kasi follows Balu back to his native place and unwittingly learns that he belongs to an influential family.

programme.title: Manik Baasha
programme.desc: Rickshaw driver Manickam is a man who avoids violence at all costs. However, when his brother, a cop, gets into trouble with some goons, it triggers a set of events that revive Manickam's old self.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Gollu Aur Pappu
programme.desc: Two brothers, Gollu and Pappu, confront Gustaad Khan, a terrorist, for blowing up their garage. However, he decides to take advantage of their innocence by making them deploy a bomb in Ludhiana.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance
programme.desc: In this urban romance, a white small-town girl moves to Chicago and meets her new boyfriend who is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

programme.title: Tequila Sunrise

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective

programme.title: Battle Of The Bulge
programme.desc: By December, 1944 the Allies believe that the Nazi Army is on the brink of total collapse. But the Germans counterattack, pushing the American Army back in a bloody offensive. Now in a battle that could decide the outcome of the war, victory or defeat depends on fuel, without which the German tanks are powerless--and the fate of the world hangs on the outcome of one small, determined fight for a single fuel depot.

programme.title: The Fourth Protocol
programme.desc: A British Agent with the task of preventing the Russians detonating a nuclear explosion next to an American base in the UK.

programme.title: Ransom
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars as a self-made millionaire who--when his son is kidnapped--makes novel, controversial and violent use of the Ransom.

programme.desc: The Walking Dead - A Navy Lieutenant Commander in impeccable shape turns to Pride and the NCIS team to solve his imminent murder after discovering he has been poisoned with a lethal dose of radiation.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: The Test
programme.desc: A school principal decides to siphon school funds to rebuild his house after a flood. But when he realizes that his students and teachers are hit just as hard as him, he begins to rethink his choice.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: East Of Sweden
programme.desc: Three men share a cabin on a night train – Dominick, an undocumented immigrant, Jere, a criminal and Aleksi, a psychiatric patient. By the night’s end, Aleksi is dead. The surviving two make a dangerous choice that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: A Summer in the Algarve
programme.desc: After having her research stolen by her boyfriend, marine biologist Dr. Julika Bergmann decides to leave Germany and visit a friend in Portugal. There, she is offered her dream job by a businessman to renaturalize coral reefs, but all is not what it seems.

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream
programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys school’s archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.

programme.title: The Carer
programme.desc: Dorottya is a young theatre actress who’s elated when offered the job as caretaker for the legendary stage actor Sir Michael Gifford. That is, until she finds out he’s a grumpy and irascible old man. Yet, an unexpected friendship soon blossoms.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: Nursery Rhymes
programme.desc: Through nursery rhymes and the politics of language, we see a childhood spent under Japanese Imperial rule in 1940s Singapore.

programme.title: Paper Boats
programme.desc: Hearing the news that his estranged daughter in America faces deportation, a man who has lost it all recovers the will to live after agreeing to take in her children. This is a timely and stirring tale about immigrant kinship and hardship in foreign land.

programme.title: Modern Murder: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: When the dead body of a young child is found on the river bank, Dresden erupts into uproar as the media stokes the public’s fear. Detectives Gorniak and Sieland struggle to balance their emotions, the public pressure and their duty to solve the crime.

programme.title: Fiore
programme.desc: Daphne, a delinquent teen, is in juvenile prison when she meets Josh, a fellow inmate. Against a rule that prohibits male-female interaction, Daphne and Josh cultivate a budding romance and navigate the vicissitudes of prison life.

programme.title: Domingo
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Modern Murder: Tender Trap
programme.desc: A young student is strangled in a car by a collective of men who had allegedly been conned by her through a dating website. Gorniak and Sieland go undercover to secretly bait the suspects but soon discover, that they are in deep and danger lurks.

programme.title: The Carer
programme.desc: Dorottya is a young theatre actress who’s elated when offered the job as caretaker for the legendary stage actor Sir Michael Gifford. That is, until she finds out he’s a grumpy and irascible old man. Yet, an unexpected friendship soon blossoms.

programme.title: Nursery Rhymes
programme.desc: Through nursery rhymes and the politics of language, we see a childhood spent under Japanese Imperial rule in 1940s Singapore.

programme.title: Joy of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: A Summer in the Algarve
programme.desc: After having her research stolen by her boyfriend, marine biologist Dr. Julika Bergmann decides to leave Germany and visit a friend in Portugal. There, she is offered her dream job by a businessman to renaturalize coral reefs, but all is not what it seems.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Homicide in St. Petersburg
programme.desc: When a childhood friend accused of murder by the Russian mafia is kidnapped, Karla feels a personal connection to the case. How will she figure out the truth of the matter?

programme.desc: Hearing the news that his estranged daughter in America faces deportation, a man who has lost it all recovers the will to live after agreeing to take in her children. This is a timely and stirring tale about immigrant kinship and hardship in foreign land.

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: Another Love

programme.title: Nightfall In India
programme.desc: In the 60s, Ricardo would facilitate overland travel from Europe to India for hippies. Now, he’s in the last stages of a degenerative disease. For his epic final journey, he sets off on the same route with his housekeeper and a hopeful spirit.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Fatal Alibi

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep01
programme.desc: That's Show Biz - Part 1 - Instant rapport develops between personnel of a U.S.O. troupe and the M*A*S*H unit when the entertainers must make an unscheduled stop at the 4077th; one of their singers needs an emergency appendectomy. Marina falls in love with Hawkeye, who saved her life by performing her operation, while Potter finds an immediate mutual fondness with Brandy, a burlesque performer that Potter remembers spinning her tassels in a Kansas City hall years ago. When the roads leaving camp are closed due to nearby gunfire everyone is glad to spend more time with the performers. Klinger and Fast Freddie, the comic, while away the days throwing horrible one-liners back and forth, and Charles finds himself increasingly attracted to a female musician. Father Mulcahy busies himself searching for singer Sarah’s GI brother and then has the sad duty of telling her he was killed in action. The U.S.O. unit thanks the 4077th for their hospitality by staging a show for their new friends and all are feeling bittersweet when the troupe must again be on its way, entertaining more soldiers in need.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Academia Nuts - Doogie is faced with having to create a fictional illness for a rich hypochondriac who makes large contributions to the hospital when she is cured of her ills. Vinnie decides to drop out of high school.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Dream - An elderly businessman, Farley, ask for Poirot's help in explaining a recurring dream in which he commits suicide using a revolver. Poirot finds it all suspicious when Farley is found shot dead the next day.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S7 Ep17
programme.desc: The Prodigal Father - Jessica probes the murder of her neighbor's (Claudia Christian) long-lost father (Donnelly Rhodes), a suspected bank robber thought to be already dead.

programme.title: Kenny Rogers as The Gambler: The Adventure Continues Ep02
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2 - Brady, Billy, and Jeremiah are on a train bound for a huge gambling event when it is taken over by a gang of killers in search of money.

programme.title: Three's Company S8 Ep02
programme.desc: She Loves Me, She Loves Me Not - Larry discovers a magazine quiz and he and Jack think one of the girls wants to have an affair with Jack. They take the girls on a trip to find out who answered the quiz so Jack can talk her out of it.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Eruption - An enormous eruption of a long-dormant volcano forces Hawke and Santini, who have just completed a mission, to land near a small town which seems to be under a spell.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Academia Nuts - Doogie is faced with having to create a fictional illness for a rich hypochondriac who makes large contributions to the hospital when she is cured of her ills. Vinnie decides to drop out of high school.

programme.title: Bionic Woman S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Canyon Of Death - Jaime is captured by men planning to steal an atomic-powered flying suit from an air base.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep02
programme.desc: That's Show Biz - Part 2 - Instant rapport develops between personnel of a U.S.O. troupe and the M*A*S*H unit when the entertainers must make an unscheduled stop at the 4077th; one of their singers needs an emergency appendectomy. Marina falls in love with Hawkeye, who saved her life by performing her operation, while Potter finds an immediate mutual fondness with Brandy, a burlesque performer that Potter remembers spinning her tassels in a Kansas City hall years ago. When the roads leaving camp are closed due to nearby gunfire everyone is glad to spend more time with the performers. Klinger and Fast Freddie, the comic, while away the days throwing horrible one-liners back and forth, and Charles finds himself increasingly attracted to a female musician. Father Mulcahy busies himself searching for singer Sarah’s GI brother and then has the sad duty of telling her he was killed in action. The U.S.O. unit thanks the 4077th for their hospitality by staging a show for their new friends and all are feeling bittersweet when the troupe must again be on its way, entertaining more soldiers in need.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S2 Ep08
programme.desc: Revenge of the Teenage Dead - Vinnie is making a ‘slasher’ film and Doogie is given the responsibility of deciding if a 13-year-old genius is a suitable candidate for medical school.

programme.title: Airwolf S2 Ep22

programme.desc: The Disappearance of Lady Frances - Watson writes to Holmes telling him of the other guests at his hotel in the Lakes. Sailing back from church across the lake, Lady Frances Carfax falls out of the boat and is rescued by a mysterious person.

programme.title: Small Wonder S3 Ep05
programme.desc: It's Okay to Say No - When a schoolyard pusher tries to hook Vicki on drugs, the Lawsons help the police on an undercover sting, to stop the pusher.

programme.desc: Sebastian Against the World - Charles confides to Julia that he thinks Sebastian is reacting against Lady Marchmain's suffocating protectiveness. Julia says Sebastian really is on the way to becoming a drunkard.

programme.title: Brideshead Revisited S1 Ep06
programme.desc: A Blow Upon a Bruise - On the way to Brideshead for Christmas, Charles meets Sebastian and Samgrass on the station, returning from their foreign tour and senses there is some mystery about the trip.

programme.title: Three's Company S8 Ep03
programme.desc: The Money Machine - Jack receives $1,000 by mistake from an automated cash machine. He hides it in the couch for the weekend, not realizing that Mr. Furley plans to replace the couch later that day.

programme.desc: Fly Jaime - Having survived a plane crash, Jaime and Dr. Wells are marked for death by three other survivors.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep03
programme.desc: Identity Crisis - The 4077th has more than medical problems to handle when three G.I.’s come to the unit for care. First they discover that Gerald Mullen has switched dog tags with a buddy who was killed two weeks before he was to be discharged in order to get himself out of the war. Then another post-op patient causes trouble by refusing to stay in bed because he is constantly trying to sell mutual funds for his company back home. The third patient needs help from the staff in answering a “Dear John" letter he has received from his girl back home.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S2 Ep09
programme.desc: Nautilus for Naught - Doogie is jealous when Wanda becomes enamored with the nude male model in her life drawing class. A pretty young model with an eating disorder is admitted into the hospital.

programme.desc: The Problem of Thor Bridge - Maria Gibson, finding only rejection from her husband, arranges to meet the children's Governess, Grace Dunbar, at Thor Bridge. Maria is shot on the bridge and Grace is accused of her murder.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep182
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Iceland with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong continues his journey around Iceland with a visit to a glacier, a trip to the island of Heimay which was nearly destroyed by a volcanic eruption in the 1970s, a walk on the most dangerous beach in the country and a night in a capsule hotel.

programme.title: Snow Animals
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin introduces a cast of charismatic animals to reveal the remarkable strategies they use to survive, and even thrive, through the winter.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Christchurch - Scottish historian and archaeologist Neil Oliver flies a kite, investigates the origins of the New Zealand accent and goes in search of a toxic arachnid with a tortured love life.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S2 Ep1
programme.desc: New Zealand - Ben returns to New Zealand to catch up with the Long family, who live a hunter-gatherer existence on the country's South Island in an area that is two days hike from the nearest road. So how have the children coped with such an isolated upbringing, and how have the parents maintained their relationship?

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep9
programme.desc: Ice Cream - Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman look at Britain's history with ice cream, and see it produced on an epic scale.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Tortilla chips - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest tortilla factory in Europe, while Cherry Healey takes on the hottest chilli in the world and Ruth Goodman reveals how the Elizabethans treated their ruff collars.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The story of the Marsh Pride continues with testimony from those who filmed them, those who tried to protect them and those who hunted them. The Maasai, who live and graze their cattle next door to the pride speak about the struggles of living close to these dangerous predators.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Galapagos - Martin explores the legendary Galapagos, getting up close to sealions, iguanas, tortoises, penguins, finches and baby sharks. He joins conservation expeditions, sees evolution in action, visits a nun, an organic farm and the site of a murder mystery.

programme.title: The Boxing Day Tsunami S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Second Wave - We pick up the story 90 minutes after the earthquake which caused the deadly wave. The tsunami had already hit Indonesia and Thailand but now a second wave was heading towards the tourist hotspots on the Thai coast.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Robson is in Costa Rica going for an epic Billfish Grand Slam. He must travel twelve hours to the best fishing spot so he has just one shot at his mission. Has he got the strength to reel in three billfish before the sun sets?

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - July-August - a Time of Migration Ep4
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Three's a Crowd Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome Anna’s clan back to Marina Bay, where two otter families have been trespassing. Feel the heat when Mia catches Anna’s scent and hustles the Townies out of reach. Then hold tight as the Nomads remain blissfully unaware of the coming conflict.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 - Survivors of the Plains Ep6
programme.desc: In clans of spotted hyenas, larger females call the shots while smaller males live peripheral lives. Meet a family suffering through drought, a mother struggling to provide for her cubs, and an orphan at the bottom of the social pile.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Camouflage and Colouration Ep6
programme.desc: Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 2 - Indonesia - the Secret Life of Manta Rays Ep4

programme.title: Luxe.This Year « Jewels, The Collections » (S51) Ep01
programme.desc: The most prestigious jewellery houses have opened their doors to LUXE.TV to unveil their most dazzling pieces. Necklaces, rings, or bracelets, there’s so much finery with sumptuous stones: rubies, sapphires, emeralds… A mix of creativity and expertise, the rarest and most delicate jewels from world renowned jewellers from Cartier to Piaget, Manalys, Schroeder, and Chopard, are displayed through their collections.

programme.title: Luxe.This Year « Life & Lifestyle Highlights » (S51) Ep01
programme.desc: Luxe.TV wants to share with you the most beautiful aspects of the art of living. Exceptional and prestigious events, inaugurations of new spaces to discover, unmissable cultural and artistic exhibitions, are all offered as pre-premieres on Luxe.TV. Every year, Luxe.TV reporters travel the world to offer you breathtaking and fabulous images in 4K and HD quality. Tune in to Luxe.TV each week to discover the most beautiful art of living.

programme.title: Luxe.This Year « Life & Lifestyle Highlights » (S51) Ep01
programme.desc: Luxe.TV wants to share with you the most beautiful aspects of the art of living. Exceptional and prestigious events, inaugurations of new spaces to discover, unmissable cultural and artistic exhibitions, are all offered as pre-premieres on Luxe.TV. Every year, Luxe.TV reporters travel the world to offer you breathtaking and fabulous images in 4K and HD quality. Tune in to Luxe.TV each week to discover the most beautiful art of living.
