programme.title: Shrek The Halls Ep1
programme.desc: Shrek The Halls - Shrek's plans for a cozy family celebration spirals into one truly unforgettable Christmas.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda Holiday Special Ep1
programme.desc: Kung Fu Panda Holiday - Po prepares for his favorite holiday, the Winter Feast and learns the true meaning of tradition, community and family.

programme.title: Merry Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Merry Madagascar - When Santa unexpectedly crash lands on the island, giving the jolly gentleman a case of amnesia - it's up to those zany zoosters to save Christmas!

programme.title: Gift Of The Night Fury Ep1
programme.desc: Dragons:Gift Of The Night Fury - As the village of Berk prepares for its winter holiday, the resident dragons all inexplicably fly away.

programme.title: Donkey'S Caroling Christmas-Tacular Ep1
programme.desc: Donkey'S Caroling Christmas-Tacular - Deck the halls with Donkey's laughter in this all-new crazy and colorful collection of animated Christmas goodies and hilarious holiday surprises.

programme.title: The Madagascar Penguins In A Christmas Caper Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar Penguins: Christmas Caper - Private heads into the city to do some last minute Christmas shopping. When he gets stuffed into a stocking it's up to his fellow penguins to save him.

programme.title: B.O.B.'S Big Break Ep1
programme.desc: B.O.B'S Big Break - B.O.B. and his monstrous crew are on a mission to bust out of the government's top-secret holding cell.

programme.title: Captain Underpants Special 2 - Mega Blissmas Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Xtreme Xploits Of The Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it’s gone forever!

programme.title: Spirit Of Christmas (Riding Free) Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders: Huttsgalor Holiday Ep1
programme.desc: Dragons Rescue Riders: Huttsgalor Holiday - When a series of unpredictable winter storms threaten to ruin Odinyule, the Viking holiday of giving, the Rescue Riders must figure out how to save the holiday.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep5
programme.desc: New Sponsor/ Cleopatra - Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show; beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep4
programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies A Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side Of The Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: Captain Underpants Special 2 - Mega Blissmas Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Xtreme Xploits Of The Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it’s gone forever!

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep5
programme.desc: New Sponsor/ Cleopatra - Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show; beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep4
programme.desc: Gnome Your Enemy - Jim undertakes his first Trollhunting mission by starting small: he must shrink down to eight inches tall to apprehend a mischievous gnome.

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep4
programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies A Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep10
programme.desc: Mentor - Khensu tasks Cleo with mentoring a younger student names Philo. But when he turns out to be just as cocky and brash as Cleo, she gets a taste of her own medicine and develops more respect for Khensu.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side Of The Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Suki’s prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his “friend” Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppy’s surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren'T Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Rupert Saves Christmas - While riding his sleigh in the sky towards the North Pole on Christmas Eve, Crinkle the snow elf falls & lands in Nutwood. Worried about the fact Santa won't be able to deliver any presents without him Rupert & friends help Crinkle attract Santa's attention in the sky by building a huge magical daisy chain. It begins to fall apart as Crinkle climbs up high and so the gang decorate a magical Christmas tree that can be seen from the sky. As they hear santa's sleigh approaching crinkle climbs the tree & is reunites with Santa ensuring all presents are delivered on Christmas day.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Rupert And The Snow Key - Jack Frost has misplaced his Snow Key which unlocks the Spring. Without the key it will be snowy & Winter in Nutwood forever. Rupert & friends search Nutwood to help find the key unknowing Raggety has found the special key & is keeping it very safe. Will the gang find it in time & unlock Spring in time for the flowers & plants in Nutwood?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep51
programme.desc: Raa Raa Goes Hunting - Raa Raa has lost his toothbrush and sets off to find it. Where can it be?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep52
programme.desc: The Noisiest House In The Jungle - The animals are exploring what noises each of their houses make… whose house do we think is the noisiest in the whole of the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep25
programme.desc: Postman Pat'S Pop Star Rescue - Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being “Best local Policeman of the year” and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep103
programme.desc: Grubby Ahoy - Grubby has got stuck on Aunt Tulip's boat. Can anybody save him before he floats away?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep104
programme.desc: Stingo Has Visitors - Stingo's tree house has been invaded by ants. Fifi is determined to get rid of them, as she doesn't want Stingo and Slugsy staying with her a moment longer than necessary!

programme.desc: 2500 Candles For Ra / It'S A Mad Mad Mad Underworld - 2500 Candles for Ra Upset that no one remembered his birthday, Ra goes to hang out with the mummies at the Deedstown museum. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin’s time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn’t work quite how they’d hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it’s gone forever!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rupert And The Undersea Adventure - Undersea adventures when Rupert, Bill and Ping Pong have to rescue Miranda the Mermaid from the clutches of a Giant Clam.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time To Be Quiet. A Time To Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble'S Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.desc: Curse Of The Sandwich / A Real Little Monster - Curse of the Sandwich After Ra accidentally bites into Thatch's sandwich, he becomes convinced that he's turning into a vampire. programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep1

programme.desc: Puss In Boots: The Three Diablos - After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.desc: For Wheeler / Brickmuda Heptagon - When Rooky discovers it's Chief Wheeler's birthday, she is determined to make it a memorable. // During the dedication ceremony of the city's deep sea vessel to honor Duke, Freya and Harl, the ship is accidentally set adrift.

programme.desc: Side Hustle / Burt Speaks - Parker picks up a bunch of side hustles in order to afford the perfect gift for Angus. // Parker believes Burt can speak via popping bubble wrap, and pretty soon, the whole mountain seeks Burt's wisdom.

programme.desc: A Very Merry Chipmas - Theodore is mistaken for an elf and whisked off to the north pole to help build toys in Santa's workshop.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Double Dangus - The chipmunks discover Officer Dangus has a twin brother that's a bully and encourage Dangus to stand up to him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Last Days of Summer - Alvin wastes his entire summer playing a video game then tries to do all the fun things he'd planned in one day.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep227
programme.desc: Old Man Patrick - Patrick thinks he's an old man, so it's up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: Danger Force S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Trojan Force - When Danger Force's fingerprints show up on crime scene evidence, they must break into police headquarters and wipe the prints, or their secret identities--and Danger Force itself--will be ruined.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Traditions - Robby backs out of Alex's traditional Wakwak hunt, so Alex shares his family history with Bumblebee, while Twitch, eager to gain her own traditions, encounters "Dad2" - Wheeljack.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Kobayashi - As Gwyn struggles to find her role aboard the Protostar, Dal tests his leadership skills in the newly discovered holodeck.

programme.desc: Toads and Tiaras / Two Boys and a Baby - After Lola gets sick and can’t compete in her pageant, Lincoln coaches Lana to take her place. // Thinking it’ll be easy, Lincoln and Clyde take on the task of babysitting the youngest Loud, Lily.

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Belles A Ringin' - While buying romance novels for a heartbroken Ellen, Nate discovers they are total cash cows. Under a pen name, he writes a best-selling graphic novel using the people in his life as inspiration until it catches up to him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep120
programme.desc: No Hat for Pat / Toy Store Of Doom - Patrick is sick of all of his friends not being able to play with him because they have to put on their Krusty Krab hats and go to work. // A new toy store has opened up in Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob and Patrick couldn't be happier!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep102
programme.desc: Penny Foolish / Nautical Novice - When Mr. Krabs sees SpongeBob pick something up off the street, he begins to obsess over the idea that SpongeBob found a penny - a penny that he should have found first! // SpongeBob's boating school class is going on a field trip.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Darker Parker / Lady of the Tree - Parker makes snowcones for everybody in town and learns that saying 'no' isn't always a bad thing. // Parker and Angus make a delivery to a spooky old woman in the Middlemost Forest... who might be a witch!

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth - When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Cow Pie Kid / Saved by the Spell - Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincoln's friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Zoo-mergency! - After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo / Tee'd Off - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet! // Worried that Lori may have a new crush, Bobby visits her in college and tries to impress her with his golf skills.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow / Dentist Trip - Parker finds a body hair, and the cloud assumes it's time to become an adult! // During a trip to the dentist, Parker remembers how the S.S. Steadfast got shipwrecked on Mt. Middlemost.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep120
programme.desc: King Cloud vs. Smogzilla / Ranch on the Side - When a malevolent Smog Cloud terrorizes Mt. Middlemost, it's up to Parker to stop it. // Parker becomes obsessed with ranch dressing.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep116
programme.desc: Squid's Visit / To SquarePants or Not to SquarePants - SpongeBob wants to have Squidward visit him at home, but Squidward won't come over, especially when he's perfectly comfortable in his own home // All of SpongeBob's square pants have shrunk in the dryer and the store is all out of square pants!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep117
programme.desc: Shuffle Boarding / Professor Squidward - Mermaidman and Barnacleboy are booked to attend a shuffleboarding tournament, but they can't go. // When Squidward is mistaken for his famous rival, Squilliam Fancyson, he is invited to teach a class at the most prestigious music school.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep118
programme.desc: Pets or Pests / Komputer Overload - SpongeBob adopts a stray worm, and to his surprise, the worm gives birth to some worm babies overnight! // Plankton is sick of Karen's criticisms, so he decides he can just replace her with some new computer inventions!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep119
programme.desc: Gullible Pants / Overbooked - SpongeBob is left in charge of the Krusty Krab while Mr. Krabs steps out for 15 minutes, and he is determined to make it the best-managed 15 minutes ever! // SpongeBob's got a full day, and he's determined to do everything he's scheduled to do.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 1 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 2 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Blind Bandit - In search for an Earthbending teacher for Aang, the kids go to an underground Earthbending tournament where they encounter Toph, a blind, but powerful Earthbender.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Operation: Good Deed - The Penguins set out to perform their own good deeds. But things don't work out as planned.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep229

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Pets Peeved / Byte-Sized - The Vesuvius Twins bring Skipper and Julien to their home and force them to fight one another. // Kowalski has another breakthrough invention, tiny robots that group together and not only fix broken tools and appliances, but run them as well.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stank Breath / Frog Day Afternoon - Buhdeuce has to deal with some awesomely bad stank breath that leads to some awesomely bad trouble. // SwaySway and Buhdeuce teach their pet Jelly how to fetch, and she accidentally fetches a monster egg.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Season of the Witch - The group arrives at the witch's castle for an epic battle of swords and spells, and a surprise admission from Stacey that shocks her father.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dorg Goes to Adventure Club / Dorg Wants a Scare - When Dorg accidentally shrinks his sister's Adventure Club sash, he must replace the badges. // Dorg wants a good scare, so Patronella fills his house with all the gang's secret fears. Dorg finds out he's more scare-able than he thought!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Just Add Sprinkles / The Write Stuff - Felicity calls a magic, but mischievous, pixie to make her malts delicious. // Felicity's new pen has a way with words, making them a reality.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Muscle C.O.P.S. / Cold Hard Cash - Sanjay grows giant calf muscles and joins a peculiar police force. // Craig risks his life to help his best bud find a frozen treasure.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Slice of Life / Goodnight, Sleep Fright - When Ollie throws a pizza slice into his pack, a monster comes looking for revenge after his world is destroyed. // Ollie's insecurity gets him stuck in his dreams after summoning the Dream Wheezy to help him sleep.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep126
programme.desc: A Bopwork Orange / Freeze Tag - Boog's gotta learn to stop bopping customers, or he's gonna lose his job. // When Man-Arctica comes down to play freeze tag with the kids, they quickly realize he plays by his own rules... which means freezing everyone in sight.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Dudley Do-Wrong / Puppy Unplugged - The Chameleon impersonates Mayor Teddy Bear and closes down TUFF, turning all of Petropolis against our heroes. // Birdbrain plunges the world into a technology-less void.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Inspiration of Sirenix - Daphne's parents hold a welcome home party to celebrate her return. But the event is interrupted when the Trix send the Beast of the Depths to attack. It's up to the Winx to find the Inspiration of Sirenix and save the party!

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Legendarium - As the fairies of Alfea celebrate Faragonda's 100th anniversary, the Trix take over Cloudtower, teaming up with Selina, a new witch with a very powerful book. Her first target: Pixie Village.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Mystic Mayhem - The Turtles discover for the first time that they're not the weirdest things in New York.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep246
programme.desc: Plankton's Old Chum / Stormy Weather - Where Plankton usually dumps his rotten chum is too full, so he tricks SpongeBob into hiding it around the city. // SpongeBob befriends a small storm cloud, but has to protect it from a crazed weather man.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep410
programme.desc: No Putts, No Glory - Alvin tricks Theodore into believing he's great at mini golf which backfires when Theo signs up for a tournament.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Granny Awards - Dave is thrilled when he thinks he's nominated for a Grammy, but it's actually an award for aging musicians.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Sick Day - Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep112
programme.desc: They're All Named Reggie / The Same Ol' Same - After delivering mail in Purpleton, the gang finds a Baby Reggie stowaway that Parker insists on returning home. // When a famous Rapper visits the Mountain, Parker gives him a new zest for life.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Cloud of the Month / A. Plumber - After receiving the Middlemost Post's 'Cloud of the Month' award, Parker gets a big head about the new title. // After clogging the toilet, Parker calls a plumber-that winds up being Ryan in disguise-to fix the problem.

programme.title: The Loud House S04 Ep422

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep104

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep147
programme.desc: Hide and Then What Happens? / Shellback Shenanigans - SpongeBob and Patrick play Hide N' Seek and SpongeBob searches the world for Patrick. // Plankton masquerades as Gary to steal the Krabby Patty formula.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Blue's Treasure Hunt - Cap'n McStripes (that's ''pirate'' for Josh) and Blue are playing pirates, but where is the treasure?! We play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bears / Pups Save a Farmerless Farm - Bears are asleep all over town! The PAW Patrol must work quietly to return them home. // With the farmers out of town, Mayor Goodway calls the PAW Patrol to control the animals and chaos on the farms!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups and the Big Twin Trick / Mighty Pups, Super Paws: Pups Save the Mega Mayor - The Ladybird's up to her tricks again but the Mighty Twins have their own super trick too! // Humdinger gets superpowers but it's a total cat-astrophe! The Mighty Pups must save the Mega Mayor from himself.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S04 Ep402

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Bryce Holdaway meets couple Rob and Harvey, who aim to find a new home for their two young sons in country NSW. Rob prefers contemporary homes, while Harvey is swayed by character. What will they choose?

programme.title: Chopsticks Or Fork? Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In 2019, the Black Summer bushfires swept through Malua Bay and destroyed Raymond's Chinese Restaurant. Ten months later, it rose from the ashes with a sleek new look, and with Raymond's daughter Emily now at the helm.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep10
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep246
programme.desc: Gemma Veness brings you all the news of the day and a closer look at the day's top stories from around the nation. Plus interviews with special guests and updates from ABC News reporters on the scene.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep246
programme.desc: Kathryn Robinson presents a complete round-up of the day's top stories, the latest news and the issues that matter. ABC Evening News brings together the best reporting from across the nation and speaks with expert guests.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep246
programme.desc: Australians turn to ABC News when news breaks at home or abroad. Kathryn Robinson presents the day's top stories, latest news and information, exclusive investigations and reports from respected journalists across the nation.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep201
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep251
programme.desc: Kathryn Robinson brings you a clearer picture of the day's top stories with local, national and global news reports. Australia's most trusted news source has the issues and events covered from all angles to keep you in touch.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep5
programme.desc: After 12 years behind bars for murder, Scott Austic was acquitted after sensational revelations of planted evidence. But where does that leave the family of victim Stacey Thorne who are still waiting for justice?

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2022 Heywire project. Presented by Karla Ranby.

programme.title: People's Republic Of Mallacoota Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - 18 months after bushfires ravaged Mallacoota, its fractious citizens vote on the plan that will determine the town's future. But after all the disagreements, who will put up their hand to turn the plan into action? (Final)

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep251
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with full coverage of today's top stories and the latest news. Matt Wordsworth brings you a complete snapshot of what's going on across the cities and suburbs, regions and rural Australia.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep2
programme.desc: Flying solo in Japan. A rich and powerful nation is facing a social crisis. Millions of young singles are turning their backs on marriage and children - will it create an epidemic of loneliness? Jake Sturmer reports.

programme.title: Art Works Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Hear from the creator of the Aussie musical about fandom that has fostered its own devotees; a Canberra coin designer; and amateur musicians who performed with the WASO, as well as poems from the National Poetry Month Gala.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep201
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep251
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date with the best coverage of today's top stories and the latest news. Tyne Logan brings you a complete snapshot of what's happening in the cities and suburbs, regions and rural Australia.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep44
programme.desc: Lisa Millar and James Glenday hear from British DJ Fatboy Slim, Knives Out actor Daniel Craig, movie critic Zak Hepburn on the best and worst in 2022, plus Alice Zaslavsky with some festive dessert ideas. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep251
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date. Tyne Logan presents ABC Late News from Perth, bringing you detailed coverage of the day's top stories, trusted analysis and new details on the issues and events that shaped our day.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One Ep11
programme.desc: Dinesh Palipana has a unique perspective on hospitals and patient care as only the second person with quadriplegia to graduate a doctor in Australia. He speaks about overcoming barriers and his life motto - carpe diem.

programme.title: Fault Lines 2022
programme.desc: We thought we'd beaten COVID, until war and economic strife, protest and authoritarianism reminded us how rapidly things can change in a connected world. War, inflation and an unfolding climate crisis sets the scene for 2023.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep2
programme.desc: Flying solo in Japan. A rich and powerful nation is facing a social crisis. Millions of young singles are turning their backs on marriage and children - will it create an epidemic of loneliness? Jake Sturmer reports.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep251
programme.desc: End your day informed and up-to-date. Tyne Logan presents ABC Late News from Perth, bringing you detailed coverage of the day's top stories, trusted analysis and new details on the issues and events that shaped our day.

programme.title: Women in Sport Spotlight Ep1
programme.desc: ABC News puts the spotlight on women making a big impact in the sporting world - from the grassroots through to the elite level, with a focus on women from under-represented backgrounds. Presented by Amanda Shalala.

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2022 Heywire project. Presented by Karla Ranby.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep201
programme.desc: Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Presented by Laura Tingle.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Series Ep1
programme.desc: How deep will the housing downturn go? We speak to property analysts, economists, and real estate agents about whether prices will rebound in 2023, plus top tips on buying or selling in this market. Presented by Alicia Barry.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point Ep44
programme.desc: Sr. 13 - This week we look back at the huge year that was 2022 and recognise some of the amazing games we played, plus we bid a fond farewell to Rad in her final episode!

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep252
programme.desc: There's always something new to talk about over breakfast. Iskhandar Razak and Madeleine Morris bring you the latest overnight developments plus news and interviews, Charles Brice with sport, and Emma Rebellato with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep247
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you the top stories of the morning and the latest news as it happens. We cross to ABC News reporters on the scene across Australia and around the globe plus media conferences and analysis from experts.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep247
programme.desc: Watch what happens as the day unfolds. Ros Childs brings you the top stories, breaking news, original reporting plus the latest details and special guests to keep you informed and up to date on the issues that matter.

programme.title: Gardening Australia: Christmas Family Special 2018
programme.desc: It's Christmas and we're excited about family time, holiday projects and getting the garden summer-ready! Costa and Millie build a cubby hideaway, Sophie pots up a succulent frame, Josh makes seed bomb bonbons.

programme.title: Going Places With Ernie Dingo Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Along the Mary River in the Northern Territory, Ernie braves the heat and explores the wilds of the region by land, sea and by air.

programme.title: Classic Choir: Oh Christmas Tree
programme.desc: The ABC Classic Choir sing a new arrangement of a Christmas favourite 'Oh Christmas Tree (Yerrbill with Clarence)' with new lyrics by Gardening Australia's Clarence Slockee and musical arrangement by Joseph Twist.

programme.title: A Girl's Guide To Hunting, Fishing And Wild Cooking Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Analiese faces her biggest challenge yet, slaughtering the pigs she's reared for meat. Friends from the mainland, including Adam Liaw, Jo Barrett and Alanna Sapwell who reaffirm her commitment to her new life.

programme.title: People's Republic Of Mallacoota Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - 18 months after bushfires ravaged Mallacoota, its fractious citizens vote on the plan that will determine the town's future. But after all the disagreements, who will put up their hand to turn the plan into action? (Final)

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces Ep5
programme.desc: In 2010 the almost treeless Nullarbor plain was in terrible drought. Pastoralists were coping with the dry in different ways and some are gearing up for even tougher conditions in the future.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Canadian John Gathright who organizes events in Aichi for kids to climb trees and learn about forests, as well as Chinese-born Kanai Matsuko, who helps foreigners living in Japan find work.

programme.title: Nhk Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Bosai: Be Prepared
programme.desc: A disaster management expert provides useful tips for overcoming the various problems women have to face when staying at an evacuation shelter and recommends essential items to prepare.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes! Featured recipe: Lamb Niku-jaga.

programme.title: Nhk Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: A Kitty'S Dreams
programme.desc: In the pleasure quarters of Edo, a precious house cat stares longingly out the window at a crowd of people going to and fro. Telltale signs scattered about the room reveal why it appears to be upset.

programme.title: Okinawa: Us Influences
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: US Influences.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: On this 3-day, 350-km trip, we meet a people made stronger by hardship and disaster as we visit a peach orchard, a high school horse riding club, and a country station staffed by three old friends.

programme.title: Nhk Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Journeys In Japan
programme.desc: Lena Yamaguchi explores the castle town, Matsusaka, learning of its grand merchant, samurai and artisan heritage, as well as delighting in its famed beef.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Hayakawa Chie has garnered international acclaim for "Plan 75," a feature-length drama about senior citizens facing choices of life and death. She shares her experience of making the film.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef
programme.desc: Featured recipes: (1) Pork Ginger Rice Burger (2) Japanese-style Coleslaw. Learn about easy, delicious, and healthy cooking with Chef Rika!

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep7
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep21
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night : Cannonier vs Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Top 10 middleweights collide on December 18, as Jared Cannonier faces off with Sean Strickland in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the Amway Center in Orlando, Florida. One of the hardest punchers in the sport, pound-for-pound, Cannonier is well aware that a big win this fall will put him back in the title conversation at 185 pounds, but he will have to dig deep to get it against a fellow elite striker in Strickland, who has won six of his last seven matchups.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night : Cannonier vs Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Top 10 middleweights collide on December 18, as Jared Cannonier faces off with Sean Strickland in the five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the Amway Center in Orlando, Florida.
